##

Please write one page which describes

1) Background  
 - What problem are you addressing? Why is there a need for this project?  What do your data look like?  
2) Objective  
 - You may need more than one.
3) Approach  
 - What strategies and tools will you use to reach your objective?  
4) Desired outcome  
 - What does the final product look like?

Use an additional page to create a timeline. Use the timeline to describe deliverables that will be held accountable within your group.
